short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Praise the FSM. Change words on webpages to be filled with more appropriate Pastafarian text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Changes: 

God, Jesus Christ, Allah, Yahweh -> The Flying Spaghetti Monster
OMG -> OMFSM
Amen -> R'amen
Ramadan -> Ramendan
Passover -> Pastover
Hello, Hi, Hey -> Ahoy
Christmas -> ChriFSMas
